member.summary: Base implementation of a data stream.

member.summary: Gets the length of the stream in bytes.

member.name: P:Nomad.FileSystem.Private.BaseStream.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets the current position within the stream.

member.name: P:Nomad.FileSystem.Private.BaseStream.CanRead
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the stream supports reading.

member.name: P:Nomad.FileSystem.Private.BaseStream.CanWrite
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the stream supports writing.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the stream supports seeking.

member.summary: Disposes the stream.

member.summary: Asynchronously disposes the stream.

member.name: M:Nomad.FileSystem.Private.BaseStream.Flush
member.summary: Clears all buffers for this stream and causes any buffered data to be written.

member.summary: Asynchronously clears all buffers for this stream and causes any buffered data to be written.

member.name: M:Nomad.FileSystem.Private.BaseStream.Seek(System.Int32,System.IO.SeekOrigin)
member.summary: Sets the position within the current stream.

member.name: T:Nomad.FileSystem.Private.FileStream.FileReadStream
member.summary: Represents a read-only file stream.

member.name: P:Nomad.FileSystem.Private.FileStream.FileReadStream.CanRead
member.summary: Indicates whether the stream supports reading.

member.name: P:Nomad.FileSystem.Private.FileStream.FileReadStream.CanWrite
member.summary: Indicates whether the stream supports writing.

member.name: F:Nomad.FileSystem.Private.FileStream.FileReadStream._streamReader
member.summary: The binary reader for the file stream.

member.name: M:Nomad.FileSystem.Private.FileStream.FileReadStream.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FileReadStream class with the specified file path, mode, and access.
member.param: The path to the file to read from.

member.name: M:Nomad.FileSystem.Private.FileStream.FileReadStream.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads a sequence of bytes from the file stream and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.
member.param: An array of bytes. When this method returns, the buffer contains the specified byte array with the values between offset and (offset + count - 1) replaced by the bytes read from the current source.
The zero-based byte offset in buffer at which to begin storing the data read from the current stream.
The maximum number of bytes to be read from the current stream.
member.returns: The total number of bytes read into the buffer. This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero if the end of the stream has been reached.

member.name: M:Nomad.FileSystem.Private.FileStream.FileReadStream.Read(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Reads a sequence of bytes from the file stream and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.
member.param: An array of bytes. When this method returns, the buffer contains the specified byte array with the values between offset and (offset + count - 1) replaced by the bytes read from the current source.
member.returns: The total number of bytes read into the buffer. This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero if the end of the stream has been reached.

member.name: M:Nomad.FileSystem.Private.FileStream.FileReadStream.Read(System.Span{System.Byte},System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads a sequence of bytes from the file stream into a span and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.
member.param: A span of bytes. When this method returns, the span contains the bytes read from the current source.
The zero-based byte offset in buffer at which to begin storing the data read from the current stream.
The maximum number of bytes to be read from the current stream.
member.returns: The total number of bytes read into the span. This can be less than the length of the span if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero if the end of the stream has been reached.

member.name: M:Nomad.FileSystem.Private.FileStream.FileReadStream.Read(System.Span{System.Byte})
member.summary: Reads a sequence of bytes from the file stream into a span and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.
member.param: A span of bytes. When this method returns, the span contains the bytes read from the current source.
member.returns: The total number of bytes read into the span. This can be less than the length of the span if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero if the end of the stream has been reached.

member.name: M:Nomad.FileSystem.Private.FileStream.FileReadStream.ReadAsync(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously reads a sequence of bytes from the file stream and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.
member.param: An array of bytes. When this method returns, the buffer contains the specified byte array with the values between offset and (offset + count - 1) replaced by the bytes read from the current source.
The zero-based byte offset in buffer at which to begin storing the data read from the current stream.
The maximum number of bytes to be read from the current stream.
A token to cancel the operation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation, containing the total number of bytes read into the buffer.

member.name: M:Nomad.FileSystem.Private.FileStream.FileReadStream.ReadAsync(System.Memory{System.Byte},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously reads a sequence of bytes from the file stream into a memory buffer and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.
member.param: A memory buffer. When this method returns, the buffer contains the bytes read from the current source.
A token to cancel the operation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation, containing the total number of bytes read into the buffer.

member.name: M:Nomad.FileSystem.Private.FileStream.FileReadStream.ReadToEnd
member.summary: Reads all remaining bytes from the current position to the end of the file stream.
member.returns: A byte array containing the remaining data in the stream.

member.name: M:Nomad.FileSystem.Private.FileStream.FileReadStream.ReadToEndAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously reads all remaining bytes from the current position to the end of the file stream.
member.param: A token to cancel the operation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation, containing a byte array with the remaining data.

member.name: M:Nomad.FileSystem.Private.FileStream.FileReadStream.ToArray
member.summary: Reads the entire file stream into a byte array.
member.returns: A byte array containing all data from the file stream.

member.name: M:Nomad.FileSystem.Private.FileStream.FileWriteStream.Write(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Writes a sequence of bytes to the file stream and advances the current position within this stream by the number of bytes written.
member.param: An array of bytes. This method copies count bytes from buffer to the current stream.
The zero-based byte offset in buffer at which to begin copying bytes to the current stream.
The number of bytes to be written to the current stream.

member.summary: Writes a sequence of bytes to the file stream and advances the current position within this stream by the number of bytes written.
member.param: An array of bytes. This method copies count bytes from buffer to the current stream.

member.summary: Writes a sequence of bytes to the file stream and advances the current position within this stream by the number of bytes written.
member.param: A read-only span of bytes. This method copies the contents of the span to the current stream.
The zero-based byte offset in buffer at which to begin copying bytes to the current stream.
The number of bytes to be written to the current stream.

member.summary: Writes a sequence of bytes to the file stream and advances the current position within this stream by the number of bytes written.

The zero-based byte offset in buffer at which to begin copying bytes to the current stream.
The number of bytes to be written to the current stream.
A token to cancel the operation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.

member.name: M:Nomad.FileSystem.Private.MemoryStream.MemoryReadStream.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.
member.param: An array of bytes. When this method returns, the buffer contains the specified byte array with the values between offset and (offset + count - 1) replaced by the bytes read from the current source.
The zero-based byte offset in buffer at which to begin storing the data read from the current stream.
The maximum number of bytes to be read from the current stream.
member.returns: The total number of bytes read into the buffer. This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero if the end of the stream has been reached.

member.name: M:Nomad.FileSystem.Private.MemoryStream.MemoryReadStream.Read(System.Byte[])

member.returns: The total number of bytes read into the buffer. This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero if the end of the stream has been reached.

member.summary: Reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream into a span and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.
member.param: A span of bytes. When this method returns, the span contains the bytes read from the current source.

The maximum number of bytes to be read from the current stream.
member.returns: The total number of bytes read into the span. This can be less than the length of the span if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero if the end of the stream has been reached.

member.param: A span of bytes. When this method returns, the span contains the bytes read from the current source.
member.returns: The total number of bytes read into the span. This can be less than the length of the span if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero if the end of the stream has been reached.

member.name: M:Nomad.FileSystem.Private.MemoryStream.MemoryReadStream.ReadAsync(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.
member.param: An array of bytes. When this method returns, the buffer contains the specified byte array with the values between offset and (offset + count - 1) replaced by the bytes read from the current source.
The zero-based byte offset in buffer at which to begin storing the data read from the current stream.
The maximum number of bytes to be read from the current stream.
A token to cancel the operation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation, containing the total number of bytes read into the buffer.

member.name: M:Nomad.FileSystem.Private.MemoryStream.MemoryReadStream.ReadAsync(System.Memory{System.Byte},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream into a memory buffer and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.
member.param: A memory buffer. When this method returns, the buffer contains the bytes read from the current source.
A token to cancel the operation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation, containing the total number of bytes read into the buffer.

member.name: M:Nomad.FileSystem.Private.MemoryStream.MemoryReadStream.ReadToEnd
member.summary: Reads all remaining bytes from the current position to the end of the stream.
member.returns: A byte array containing the remaining data in the stream.

member.name: M:Nomad.FileSystem.Private.MemoryStream.MemoryReadStream.ReadToEndAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously reads all remaining bytes from the current position to the end of the stream.
member.param: A token to cancel the operation.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation, containing a byte array with the remaining data.
